summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4177 for the improvement of Golf Drive, from 12th Avenue South to 10th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, under Ordinance No. 49797, and levying and assessing amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
